column2: As the magic they work seeps into their bodies, it evokes changes in sorcerers that are both unique and horrific.
At first his legs turn grey and solid and his ability to walk is diminished.
The curse progresses very slowly over many turns.
Then his lower body and torso turn to stone, and his followers are obliged to carry him around.
The curse progresses very slowly over many turns.
Once his arms become stone he is entirely dependent upon his followers to perform his magic.
The curse progresses very slowly over many turns.
After a while his entire body turns to stone and he becomes a statue. Such is the price to pay to be bestowed with the blessings of Hashut.
The curse progresses very slowly over many turns.
